Uses of Class
org.openide.filesystems.annotations.LayerBuilder

  • Packages that use LayerBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.openide.filesystems.annotations
    Support for writing annotation processors which generate XML layer fragments.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected LayerBuilder LayerGeneratingProcessor.layer(Element... originatingElements)
      Access the generated XML layer.
      LayerBuilder LayerBuilder.File.write()
      Writes the file or folder to the layer.
